comment.author: 72541197@N06
comment._content: The direction of the view is southeast, possibly taken from James Street. The rock with the building is Elephant Rock. The building is much larger now, and home to Vikings Surf Club.  The headland in the background is Point Danger (Coolangatta).

comment.author: 72541197@N06
comment._content: Tugun Beach in the middle distance. Coolangatta airport (established in 1936) is just out of shot near where the beach curves back to the left.
